參加.definition: to participate; to take part; to join

參劾.definition: to accuse; to impeach; (in imperial China) to level charges against an official

參半.definition: half; half and half; both ... and ...; just as much ... as ...; equally

參天.definition: (of a tree etc) to reach up to the sky

參孫.definition: Samson, biblical figure in the Book of Judges known for his strength and feats against the Philistines

參宿七.definition: Rigel (star); lit. seventh star of the Three Stars Chinese constellation

參展.definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc

參差錯落.definition: uneven and jumbled (idiom); irregular and disorderly; in a tangled mess

參悟.definition: to comprehend (the nature of things etc); to achieve enlightenment

參戰.definition: to go to war; to engage in war

參拜.definition: to formally call on; to worship (a God); to pay homage to sb

參政.definition: to be involved in politics; participation in politics

參校.definition: to proofread; to revise one or more editions of a text using an authoritative edition as a source book; to editorially revise a text

參演.definition: to take part in a performance; to appear in (a movie etc)

參照.definition: to consult a reference; to refer to (another document)

參看.definition: to consult for reference; see also; please refer to

參禪.definition: to practice Chan Buddhist meditation; to practice Zen meditation; to sit in meditation

參考.definition: consultation; reference; to consult; to refer

參考文獻.definition: cited material; reference (to the literature); bibliography

參茸.definition: ginseng and young deer antler (used in TCM)

參薯.definition: Dioscorea alata (Kinampay or aromatic purple yam, a sweet root crop)

參見.definition: to refer to; see also; compare (cf.); to pay respect to

參觀.definition: to look around; to tour; to visit

參詳.definition: to collate and examine critically (texts etc)

參謁.definition: to visit; to pay one's respects to (a revered figure etc); to pay homage (at a tomb etc)

參賽.definition: to compete; to take part in a competition

參贊.definition: to serve as an adviser; (diplomatic rank) attaché; counselor

參軍.definition: to join the army; (official title in imperial China) military adviser; aide-de-camp

參選.definition: to be a candidate in an election or other selection process; to run for office; to turn out to vote

參量.definition: parameter (math); quantity used as a parameter; modulus (math.)

參閱.definition: to consult; to refer to; to read (instructions)

參院.definition: abbr. for 參議院|参议院[can1 yi4 yuan4], senate; upper chamber (of legislative assembly)

參雞湯.definition: samgyetang, popular Korean chicken soup with ginseng, spices etc

參預.definition: variant of 參與|参与[can1 yu4]
